content.prompt: Which of the following developments in labor systems in the United States before the Civil War is reflected by the data in the graph?

choices.label: Indentured servants replaced wage laborers in the North.
Women laborers performed less industrial work in the North.
Large numbers of immigrants moved to urban areas in the South.
An internal trade in enslaved people spread throughout the South.

topic.text: 5.8: Military Conflict in the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
